00087 static void bddVarToConst ARGS((DdNode *f, DdNode **gp, DdNode **hp, DdNode *one));
00088 static int bddVarToCanonical ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode **fp, DdNode **gp, DdNode **hp, unsigned int *topfp, unsigned int *topgp, unsigned int *tophp));
00089 static int bddVarToCanonicalSimple ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode **fp, DdNode **gp, DdNode **hp, unsigned int *topfp, unsigned int *topgp, unsigned int *tophp));

00112 DdNode *
00113 Cudd_bddIte(
00114   DdManager * dd,
00115   DdNode * f,
00116   DdNode * g,
00117   DdNode * h)
00118 {
00119     DdNode *res;
00120 
00121     do {
00122         dd->reordered = 0;
00123         res = cuddBddIteRecur(dd,f,g,h);
00124     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00125     return(res);
00126 
00127 } /* end of Cudd_bddIte */

00143 DdNode *
00144 Cudd_bddIteConstant(
00145   DdManager * dd,
00146   DdNode * f,
00147   DdNode * g,
00148   DdNode * h)
00149 {
00150     DdNode       *r, *Fv, *Fnv, *Gv, *Gnv, *H, *Hv, *Hnv, *t, *e;
00151     DdNode       *one = DD_ONE(dd);
00152     DdNode       *zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00153     int          comple;
00154     unsigned int topf, topg, toph, v;
00155 
00156     /* Trivial cases. */
00157     if (f == one)                       /* ITE(1,G,H) => G */
00158         return(g);
00159     
00160     if (f == zero)                      /* ITE(0,G,H) => H */
00161         return(h);
00162     
00163     /* f now not a constant. */
00164     bddVarToConst(f, &g, &h, one);      /* possibly convert g or h */
00165                                         /* to constants */
00166 
00167     if (g == h)                         /* ITE(F,G,G) => G */
00168         return(g);
00169 
00170     if (Cudd_IsConstant(g) && Cudd_IsConstant(h)) 
00171         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);        /* ITE(F,1,0) or ITE(F,0,1) */
00172                                         /* => DD_NON_CONSTANT */
00173     
00174     if (g == Cudd_Not(h))
00175         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);        /* ITE(F,G,G') => DD_NON_CONSTANT */
00176                                         /* if F != G and F != G' */
00177     
00178     comple = bddVarToCanonical(dd, &f, &g, &h, &topf, &topg, &toph);
00179 
00180     /* Cache lookup. */
00181     r = cuddConstantLookup(dd, Cudd_bddIteConstant, f, g, h);
00182     if (r != NULL) {
00183         return(Cudd_NotCond(r,comple && r != DD_NON_CONSTANT));
00184     }
00185 
00186     v = ddMin(topg, toph);
00187 
00188     /* ITE(F,G,H) = (v,G,H) (non constant) if F = (v,1,0), v < top(G,H). */
00189     if (topf < v && cuddT(f) == one && cuddE(f) == zero) {
00190         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00191     }
00192 
00193     /* Compute cofactors. */
00194     if (topf <= v) {
00195         v = ddMin(topf, v);             /* v = top_var(F,G,H) */
00196         Fv = cuddT(f); Fnv = cuddE(f);
00197     } else {
00198         Fv = Fnv = f;
00199     }
00200 
00201     if (topg == v) {
00202         Gv = cuddT(g); Gnv = cuddE(g);
00203     } else {
00204         Gv = Gnv = g;
00205     }
00206 
00207     if (toph == v) {
00208         H = Cudd_Regular(h);
00209         Hv = cuddT(H); Hnv = cuddE(H);
00210         if (Cudd_IsComplement(h)) {
00211             Hv = Cudd_Not(Hv);
00212             Hnv = Cudd_Not(Hnv);
00213         }
00214     } else {
00215         Hv = Hnv = h;
00216     }
00217 
00218     /* Recursion. */
00219     t = Cudd_bddIteConstant(dd, Fv, Gv, Hv);
00220     if (t == DD_NON_CONSTANT || !Cudd_IsConstant(t)) {
00221         cuddCacheInsert(dd, Cudd_bddIteConstant, f, g, h, DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00222         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00223     }
00224     e = Cudd_bddIteConstant(dd, Fnv, Gnv, Hnv);
00225     if (e == DD_NON_CONSTANT || !Cudd_IsConstant(e) || t != e) {
00226         cuddCacheInsert(dd, Cudd_bddIteConstant, f, g, h, DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00227         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00228     }
00229     cuddCacheInsert(dd, Cudd_bddIteConstant, f, g, h, t);
00230     return(Cudd_NotCond(t,comple));
00231 
00232 } /* end of Cudd_bddIteConstant */

00250 DdNode *
00251 Cudd_bddIntersect(
00252   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00253   DdNode * f /* first operand */,
00254   DdNode * g /* second operand */)
00255 {
00256     DdNode *res;
00257 
00258     do {
00259         dd->reordered = 0;
00260         res = cuddBddIntersectRecur(dd,f,g);
00261     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00262 
00263     return(res);
00264 
00265 } /* end of Cudd_bddIntersect */

00289

00313 DdNode *
00314 Cudd_bddOr(
00315   DdManager * dd,
00316   DdNode * f,
00317   DdNode * g)
00318 {
00319     DdNode *res;
00320 
00321     do {
00322         dd->reordered = 0;
00323         res = cuddBddAndRecur(dd,Cudd_Not(f),Cudd_Not(g));
00324     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00325     res = Cudd_NotCond(res,res != NULL);
00326     return(res);

00468 int
00469 Cudd_bddLeq(
00470   DdManager * dd,
00471   DdNode * f,
00472   DdNode * g)
00473 {
00474     DdNode *one, *zero, *tmp, *F, *fv, *fvn, *gv, *gvn;
00475     unsigned int topf, topg, res;
00476 
00477     /* Terminal cases and normalization. */
00478     if (f == g) return(1);
00479 
00480     if (Cudd_IsComplement(g)) {
00481         /* Special case: if f is regular and g is complemented,
00482         ** f(1,...,1) = 1 > 0 = g(1,...,1).
00483         */
00484         if (!Cudd_IsComplement(f)) return(0);
00485         /* Both are complemented: Swap and complement because
00486         ** f <= g <=> g' <= f' and we want the second argument to be regular.
00487         */
00488         tmp = g;
00489         g = Cudd_Not(f);
00490         f = Cudd_Not(tmp);
00491     } else if (Cudd_IsComplement(f) && g < f) {
00492         tmp = g;
00493         g = Cudd_Not(f);
00494         f = Cudd_Not(tmp);
00495     }
00496 
00497     /* Now g is regular and, if f is not regular, f < g. */
00498     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00499     if (g == one) return(1);    /* no need to test against zero */
00500     if (f == one) return(0);    /* since at this point g != one */
00501     if (Cudd_Not(f) == g) return(0); /* because neither is constant */
00502     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00503     if (f == zero) return(1);
00504 
00505     /* Here neither f nor g is constant. */
00506 
00507     /* Check cache. */
00508     tmp = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,(DdNode * (*)(DdManager *, DdNode *,
00509                            DdNode *))Cudd_bddLeq,f,g);
00510     if (tmp != NULL) {
00511         return(tmp == one);
00512     }
00513 
00514     /* Compute cofactors. */
00515     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00516     topf = dd->perm[F->index];
00517     topg = dd->perm[g->index];
00518     if (topf <= topg) {
00519         fv = cuddT(F); fvn = cuddE(F);
00520         if (f != F) {
00521             fv = Cudd_Not(fv);
00522             fvn = Cudd_Not(fvn);
00523         }
00524     } else {
00525         fv = fvn = f;
00526     }
00527     if (topg <= topf) {
00528         gv = cuddT(g); gvn = cuddE(g);
00529     } else {
00530         gv = gvn = g;
00531     }
00532 
00533     /* Recursive calls. Since we want to maximize the probability of
00534     ** the special case f(1,...,1) > g(1,...,1), we consider the negative
00535     ** cofactors first. Indeed, the complementation parity of the positive
00536     ** cofactors is the same as the one of the parent functions.
00537     */
00538     res = Cudd_bddLeq(dd,fvn,gvn) && Cudd_bddLeq(dd,fv,gv);
00539 
00540     /* Store result in cache and return. */
00541     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,(DdNode * (*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *))Cudd_bddLeq,f,g,(res ? one : zero));
00542     return(res);
00543 
00544 } /* end of Cudd_bddLeq */
00545

00550 
00551 
00565 DdNode *
00566 cuddBddIteRecur(
00567   DdManager * dd,
00568   DdNode * f,
00569   DdNode * g,
00570   DdNode * h)
00571 {
00572     DdNode       *one, *zero, *res;
00573     DdNode       *r, *Fv, *Fnv, *Gv, *Gnv, *H, *Hv, *Hnv, *t, *e;
00574     unsigned int topf, topg, toph, v;
00575     int          index = 0;
00576     int          comple;
00577 
00578     /* Terminal cases. */
00579 
00580     /* One variable cases. */
00581     if (f == (one = DD_ONE(dd)))        /* ITE(1,G,H) = G */
00582         return(g);
00583     
00584     if (f == (zero = Cudd_Not(one)))    /* ITE(0,G,H) = H */
00585         return(h);
00586     
00587     /* From now on, f is known not to be a constant. */
00588     if (g == one || f == g) {   /* ITE(F,F,H) = ITE(F,1,H) = F + H */
00589         if (h == zero) {        /* ITE(F,1,0) = F */
00590             return(f);
00591         } else {
00592             res = cuddBddAndRecur(dd,Cudd_Not(f),Cudd_Not(h));
00593             return(Cudd_NotCond(res,res != NULL));
00594         }
00595     } else if (g == zero || f == Cudd_Not(g)) { /* ITE(F,!F,H) = ITE(F,0,H) = !F * H */
00596         if (h == one) {         /* ITE(F,0,1) = !F */
00597             return(Cudd_Not(f));
00598         } else {
00599             res = cuddBddAndRecur(dd,Cudd_Not(f),h);
00600             return(res);
00601         }
00602     }
00603     if (h == zero || f == h) {    /* ITE(F,G,F) = ITE(F,G,0) = F * G */
00604         res = cuddBddAndRecur(dd,f,g);
00605         return(res);
00606     } else if (h == one || f == Cudd_Not(h)) { /* ITE(F,G,!F) = ITE(F,G,1) = !F + G */
00607         res = cuddBddAndRecur(dd,f,Cudd_Not(g));
00608         return(Cudd_NotCond(res,res != NULL));
00609     }
00610 
00611     /* Check remaining one variable case. */
00612     if (g == h) {               /* ITE(F,G,G) = G */
00613         return(g);
00614     }
00615     
00616     /* From here, there are no constants. */
00617     comple = bddVarToCanonicalSimple(dd, &f, &g, &h, &topf, &topg, &toph);
00618 
00619     /* f & g are now regular pointers */
00620 
00621     v = ddMin(topg, toph);
00622 
00623     /* A shortcut: ITE(F,G,H) = (v,G,H) if F = (v,1,0), v < top(G,H). */
00624     if (topf < v && cuddT(f) == one && cuddE(f) == zero) {
00625         r = cuddUniqueInter(dd, (int) f->index, g, h);
00626         return(Cudd_NotCond(r,comple && r != NULL));
00627     }
00628 
00629     /* Check cache. */
00630     r = cuddCacheLookup(dd, Cudd_bddIte, f, g, h);
00631     if (r != NULL) {
00632         return(Cudd_NotCond(r,comple));
00633     }
00634 
00635     /* Compute cofactors. */
00636     if (topf <= v) {
00637         v = ddMin(topf, v);     /* v = top_var(F,G,H) */
00638         index = f->index;
00639         Fv = cuddT(f); Fnv = cuddE(f);
00640     } else {
00641         Fv = Fnv = f;
00642     }
00643     if (topg == v) {
00644         index = g->index;
00645         Gv = cuddT(g); Gnv = cuddE(g);
00646     } else {
00647         Gv = Gnv = g;
00648     }
00649     if (toph == v) {
00650         H = Cudd_Regular(h);
00651         index = H->index;
00652         Hv = cuddT(H); Hnv = cuddE(H);
00653         if (Cudd_IsComplement(h)) {
00654             Hv = Cudd_Not(Hv);
00655             Hnv = Cudd_Not(Hnv);
00656         }
00657     } else {
00658         Hv = Hnv = h;
00659     }
00660 
00661     /* Recursive step. */
00662     t = cuddBddIteRecur(dd,Fv,Gv,Hv);
00663     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00664     cuddRef(t);
00665 
00666     e = cuddBddIteRecur(dd,Fnv,Gnv,Hnv);
00667     if (e == NULL) {
00668         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd,t);
00669         return(NULL);
00670     }
00671     cuddRef(e);
00672 
00673     r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd,index,t,e);
00674     if (r == NULL) {
00675         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd,t);
00676         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd,e);
00677         return(NULL);
00678     }
00679     cuddDeref(t);
00680     cuddDeref(e);
00681 
00682     cuddCacheInsert(dd,Cudd_bddIte,f,g,h,r);
00683     return(Cudd_NotCond(r,comple));
00684 
00685 } /* end of cuddBddIteRecur */
00686 
00687 
00699 DdNode *
00700 cuddBddIntersectRecur(
00701   DdManager * dd,
00702   DdNode * f,
00703   DdNode * g)
00704 {
00705     DdNode *res;
00706     DdNode *F, *G, *t, *e;
00707     DdNode *fv, *fnv, *gv, *gnv;
00708     DdNode *one, *zero;
00709     unsigned int index, topf, topg;
00710 
00711     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00712     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00713 
00714     /* Terminal cases. */
00715     if (f == zero || g == zero || f == Cudd_Not(g)) return(zero);
00716     if (f == g || g == one) return(f);
00717     if (f == one) return(g);
00718 
00719     /* At this point f and g are not constant. */
00720     if (f > g) { DdNode *tmp = f; f = g; g = tmp; }
00721     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,Cudd_bddIntersect,f,g);
00722     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00723 
00724     /* Find splitting variable. Here we can skip the use of cuddI,
00725     ** because the operands are known to be non-constant.
00726     */
00727     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00728     topf = dd->perm[F->index];
00729     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00730     topg = dd->perm[G->index];
00731 
00732     /* Compute cofactors. */
00733     if (topf <= topg) {
00734         index = F->index;
00735         fv = cuddT(F);
00736         fnv = cuddE(F);
00737         if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00738             fv = Cudd_Not(fv);
00739             fnv = Cudd_Not(fnv);
00740         }
00741     } else {
00742         index = G->index;
00743         fv = fnv = f;
00744     }
00745 
00746     if (topg <= topf) {
00747         gv = cuddT(G);
00748         gnv = cuddE(G);
00749         if (Cudd_IsComplement(g)) {
00750             gv = Cudd_Not(gv);
00751             gnv = Cudd_Not(gnv);
00752         }
00753     } else {
00754         gv = gnv = g;
00755     }
00756 
00757     /* Compute partial results. */
00758     t = cuddBddIntersectRecur(dd,fv,gv);
00759     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00760     cuddRef(t);
00761     if (t != zero) {
00762         e = zero;
00763     } else {
00764         e = cuddBddIntersectRecur(dd,fnv,gnv);
00765         if (e == NULL) {
00766             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, t);
00767             return(NULL);
00768         }
00769     }
00770     cuddRef(e);
00771 
00772     if (t == e) { /* both equal zero */
00773         res = t;
00774     } else if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
00775         res = cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)index,Cudd_Not(t),Cudd_Not(e));
00776         if (res == NULL) {
00777             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, t);
00778             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, e);
00779             return(NULL);
00780         }
00781         res = Cudd_Not(res);
00782     } else {
00783         res = cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)index,t,e);
00784         if (res == NULL) {
00785             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, t);
00786             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, e);
00787             return(NULL);
00788         }
00789     }
00790     cuddDeref(e);
00791     cuddDeref(t);
00792 
00793     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,Cudd_bddIntersect,f,g,res);
00794 
00795     return(res);
00796 
00797 } /* end of cuddBddIntersectRecur */
00798 
00799 
00813 DdNode *
00814 cuddBddAndRecur(
00815   DdManager * manager,
00816   DdNode * f,
00817   DdNode * g)
00818 {
00819     DdNode *F, *fv, *fnv, *G, *gv, *gnv;
00820     DdNode *one, *zero, *r, *t, *e;
00821     unsigned int topf, topg, index;
00822 
00823     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00824     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00825 
00826     /* Terminal cases. */
00827     if (f == zero || g == zero || f == Cudd_Not(g)) return(zero);
00828     if (f == g || g == one) return(f);
00829     if (f == one) return(g);
00830 
00831     /* At this point f and g are not constant. */
00832     if (f < g) { /* Try to increase cache efficiency. */
00833         DdNode *tmp = f;
00834         f = g;
00835         g = tmp;
00836     }
00837 
00838     /* Check cache. */
00839     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00840     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00841     if (F->ref != 1 || G->ref != 1) {
00842         r = cuddCacheLookup2(manager, Cudd_bddAnd, f, g);
00843         if (r != NULL) return(r);
00844     }
00845 
00846     /* Here we can skip the use of cuddI, because the operands are known
00847     ** to be non-constant.
00848     */
00849     topf = manager->perm[F->index];
00850     topg = manager->perm[G->index];
00851 
00852     /* Compute cofactors. */
00853     if (topf <= topg) {
00854         index = F->index;
00855         fv = cuddT(F);
00856         fnv = cuddE(F);
00857         if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00858             fv = Cudd_Not(fv);
00859             fnv = Cudd_Not(fnv);
00860         }
00861     } else {
00862         index = G->index;
00863         fv = fnv = f;
00864     }
00865 
00866     if (topg <= topf) {
00867         gv = cuddT(G);
00868         gnv = cuddE(G);
00869         if (Cudd_IsComplement(g)) {
00870             gv = Cudd_Not(gv);
00871             gnv = Cudd_Not(gnv);
00872         }
00873     } else {
00874         gv = gnv = g;
00875     }
00876 
00877     t = cuddBddAndRecur(manager, fv, gv);
00878     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00879     cuddRef(t);
00880 
00881     e = cuddBddAndRecur(manager, fnv, gnv);
00882     if (e == NULL) {
00883         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, t);
00884         return(NULL);
00885     }
00886     cuddRef(e);
00887 
00888     if (t == e) {
00889         r = t;
00890     } else {
00891         if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
00892             r = cuddUniqueInter(manager,(int)index,Cudd_Not(t),Cudd_Not(e));
00893             if (r == NULL) {
00894                 Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, t);
00895                 Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, e);
00896                 return(NULL);
00897             }
00898             r = Cudd_Not(r);
00899         } else {
00900             r = cuddUniqueInter(manager,(int)index,t,e);
00901             if (r == NULL) {
00902                 Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, t);
00903                 Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, e);
00904                 return(NULL);
00905             }
00906         }
00907     }
00908     cuddDeref(e);
00909     cuddDeref(t);
00910     if (F->ref != 1 || G->ref != 1)
00911         cuddCacheInsert2(manager, Cudd_bddAnd, f, g, r);
00912     return(r);
00913 
00914 } /* end of cuddBddAndRecur */
00915 
00916 
00930 DdNode *
00931 cuddBddXorRecur(
00932   DdManager * manager,
00933   DdNode * f,
00934   DdNode * g)
00935 {
00936     DdNode *fv, *fnv, *G, *gv, *gnv;
00937     DdNode *one, *zero, *r, *t, *e;
00938     unsigned int topf, topg, index;
00939 
00940     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00941     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00942 
00943     /* Terminal cases. */
00944     if (f == g) return(zero);
00945     if (f == Cudd_Not(g)) return(one);
00946     if (f < g) { /* Try to increase cache efficiency and simplify tests. */
00947         DdNode *tmp = f;
00948         f = g;
00949         g = tmp;
00950     }
00951     if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00952         f = Cudd_Not(f);
00953         g = Cudd_Not(g);
00954     }
00955     /* Now the first argument is regular. */
00956     if (f == one) return(Cudd_Not(g));
00957     if (g == zero) return(f);
00958     if (g == one) return(Cudd_Not(f));
00959 
00960     /* At this point f and g are not constant. */
00961 
00962     /* Check cache. */
00963     r = cuddCacheLookup2(manager, Cudd_bddXor, f, g);
00964     if (r != NULL) return(r);
00965 
00966     /* Here we can skip the use of cuddI, because the operands are known
00967     ** to be non-constant.
00968     */
00969     topf = manager->perm[f->index];
00970     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00971     topg = manager->perm[G->index];
00972 
00973     /* Compute cofactors. */
00974     if (topf <= topg) {
00975         index = f->index;
00976         fv = cuddT(f);
00977         fnv = cuddE(f);
00978     } else {
00979         index = G->index;
00980         fv = fnv = f;
00981     }
00982 
00983     if (topg <= topf) {
00984         gv = cuddT(G);
00985         gnv = cuddE(G);
00986         if (Cudd_IsComplement(g)) {
00987             gv = Cudd_Not(gv);
00988             gnv = Cudd_Not(gnv);
00989         }
00990     } else {
00991         gv = gnv = g;
00992     }
00993 
00994     t = cuddBddXorRecur(manager, fv, gv);
00995     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00996     cuddRef(t);
00997 
00998     e = cuddBddXorRecur(manager, fnv, gnv);
00999     if (e == NULL) {
01000         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, t);
01001         return(NULL);
01002     }
01003     cuddRef(e);
01004 
01005     if (t == e) {
01006         r = t;
01007     } else {
01008         if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
01009             r = cuddUniqueInter(manager,(int)index,Cudd_Not(t),Cudd_Not(e));
01010             if (r == NULL) {
01011                 Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, t);
01012                 Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, e);
01013                 return(NULL);
01014             }
01015             r = Cudd_Not(r);
01016         } else {
01017             r = cuddUniqueInter(manager,(int)index,t,e);
01018             if (r == NULL) {
01019                 Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, t);
01020                 Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, e);
01021                 return(NULL);
01022             }
01023         }
01024     }
01025     cuddDeref(e);
01026     cuddDeref(t);
01027     cuddCacheInsert2(manager, Cudd_bddXor, f, g, r);
01028     return(r);
01029 
01030 } /* end of cuddBddXorRecur */
01031 
01032 
01033 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01034 /* Definition of static functions                                            */
01035 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01036 
01037 
01050 static void
01051 bddVarToConst(
01052   DdNode * f,
01053   DdNode ** gp,
01054   DdNode ** hp,
01055   DdNode * one)
01056 {
01057     DdNode *g = *gp;
01058     DdNode *h = *hp;
01059 
01060     if (f == g) {    /* ITE(F,F,H) = ITE(F,1,H) = F + H */
01061         *gp = one;
01062     } else if (f == Cudd_Not(g)) {    /* ITE(F,!F,H) = ITE(F,0,H) = !F * H */
01063         *gp = Cudd_Not(one);
01064     }
01065     if (f == h) {    /* ITE(F,G,F) = ITE(F,G,0) = F * G */
01066         *hp = Cudd_Not(one);
01067     } else if (f == Cudd_Not(h)) {    /* ITE(F,G,!F) = ITE(F,G,1) = !F + G */
01068         *hp = one;
01069     }
01070 
01071 } /* end of bddVarToConst */
01072 
01073 
01085 static int
01086 bddVarToCanonical(
01087   DdManager * dd,
01088   DdNode ** fp,
01089   DdNode ** gp,
01090   DdNode ** hp,
01091   unsigned int * topfp,
01092   unsigned int * topgp,
01093   unsigned int * tophp)
01094 {
01095     register DdNode             *F, *G, *H, *r, *f, *g, *h;
01096     register unsigned int       topf, topg, toph;
01097     DdNode                      *one = dd->one;
01098     int                         comple, change;
01099 
01100     f = *fp;
01101     g = *gp;
01102     h = *hp;
01103     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
01104     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
01105     H = Cudd_Regular(h);
01106     topf = cuddI(dd,F->index);
01107     topg = cuddI(dd,G->index);
01108     toph = cuddI(dd,H->index);
01109 
01110     change = 0;
01111 
01112     if (G == one) {                     /* ITE(F,c,H) */
01113         if ((topf > toph) || (topf == toph && f > h)) {
01114             r = h;
01115             h = f;
01116             f = r;                      /* ITE(F,1,H) = ITE(H,1,F) */
01117             if (g != one) {     /* g == zero */
01118                 f = Cudd_Not(f);                /* ITE(F,0,H) = ITE(!H,0,!F) */
01119                 h = Cudd_Not(h);
01120             }
01121             change = 1;
01122         }
01123     } else if (H == one) {              /* ITE(F,G,c) */
01124         if ((topf > topg) || (topf == topg && f > g)) {
01125             r = g;
01126             g = f;
01127             f = r;                      /* ITE(F,G,0) = ITE(G,F,0) */
01128             if (h == one) {
01129                 f = Cudd_Not(f);                /* ITE(F,G,1) = ITE(!G,!F,1) */
01130                 g = Cudd_Not(g);
01131             }
01132             change = 1;
01133         }
01134     } else if (g == Cudd_Not(h)) {      /* ITE(F,G,!G) = ITE(G,F,!F) */
01135         if ((topf > topg) || (topf == topg && f > g)) {
01136             r = f;
01137             f = g;
01138             g = r;
01139             h = Cudd_Not(r);
01140             change = 1;
01141         }
01142     }
01143     /* adjust pointers so that the first 2 arguments to ITE are regular */
01144     if (Cudd_IsComplement(f) != 0) {    /* ITE(!F,G,H) = ITE(F,H,G) */
01145         f = Cudd_Not(f);
01146         r = g;
01147         g = h;
01148         h = r;
01149         change = 1;
01150     }
01151     comple = 0;
01152     if (Cudd_IsComplement(g) != 0) {    /* ITE(F,!G,H) = !ITE(F,G,!H) */
01153         g = Cudd_Not(g);
01154         h = Cudd_Not(h);
01155         change = 1;
01156         comple = 1;
01157     }
01158     if (change != 0) {
01159         *fp = f;
01160         *gp = g;
01161         *hp = h;
01162     }
01163     *topfp = cuddI(dd,f->index);
01164     *topgp = cuddI(dd,g->index);
01165     *tophp = cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(h)->index);
01166 
01167     return(comple);
01168 
01169 } /* end of bddVarToCanonical */
01170 
01171 
01183 static int
01184 bddVarToCanonicalSimple(
01185   DdManager * dd,
01186   DdNode ** fp,
01187   DdNode ** gp,
01188   DdNode ** hp,
01189   unsigned int * topfp,
01190   unsigned int * topgp,
01191   unsigned int * tophp)
01192 {
01193     register DdNode             *F, *G, *r, *f, *g, *h;
01194     register unsigned int       topf, topg;
01195     int                         comple, change;
01196 
01197     f = *fp;
01198     g = *gp;
01199     h = *hp;
01200 
01201     change = 0;
01202 
01203     if (g == Cudd_Not(h)) {     /* ITE(F,G,!G) = ITE(G,F,!F) */
01204         F = Cudd_Regular(f);
01205         topf = cuddI(dd,F->index);
01206         G = Cudd_Regular(g);
01207         topg = cuddI(dd,G->index);
01208         if ((topf > topg) || (topf == topg && f > g)) {
01209             r = f;
01210             f = g;
01211             g = r;
01212             h = Cudd_Not(r);
01213             change = 1;
01214         }
01215     }
01216     /* adjust pointers so that the first 2 arguments to ITE are regular */
01217     if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) { /* ITE(!F,G,H) = ITE(F,H,G) */
01218         f = Cudd_Not(f);
01219         r = g;
01220         g = h;
01221         h = r;
01222         change = 1;
01223     }
01224     comple = 0;
01225     if (Cudd_IsComplement(g)) { /* ITE(F,!G,H) = !ITE(F,G,!H) */
01226         g = Cudd_Not(g);
01227         h = Cudd_Not(h);
01228         change = 1;
01229         comple = 1;
01230     }
01231     if (change) {
01232         *fp = f;
01233         *gp = g;
01234         *hp = h;
01235     }
01236 
01237     /* Here we can skip the use of cuddI, because the operands are known
01238     ** to be non-constant.
01239     */
01240     *topfp = dd->perm[f->index];
01241     *topgp = dd->perm[g->index];
01242     *tophp = dd->perm[Cudd_Regular(h)->index];
01243 
01244     return(comple);
01245 
01246 } /* end of bddVarToCanonicalSimple */
